TopicTitle: Need recruits for a starmade faction (Nextech Enterprises Recruiting)

Articles.Content:
Hmm... I was getting *eeehhh* framerate levels on lowish settings, I was fairly disappointed.

Then I realized that KSP was open still. XD

It's much better now.

> 
> Hmm... I was getting *eeehhh* framerate levels on lowish settings, I was fairly disappointed.
> Then I realized that KSP was open still. XD
> 
> It's much better now.

lol, Thats what i call loyalty to squad! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Joined server.

> 
> Joined server.

Ok please feel free to get settled mine a uninhabited system and build a ship for yourself, (Please give it really good jump capability and a lot of salvagers.)

- - - Updated - - -

Everybody please tell me your starmade usernames so i can invite you when i get logged in, sometime tomorrow possibly.

I may hop on. I myself haven't played Starmade in a while, so I have no idea what it is quite like now. I'm not really sure of what the whole thing about the paid stuff is, and since supposedly once the free version is removed it will be more expensive I may buy it on steam.

Thank you ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Server is back up. Me and starwhip have been on designing ships and such, collecting resources and turning them into credits and such. Lots of fun! ( I wish you could change the controls though ![:huh:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_undecided.gif) )

I believe you can change the controls, I will be there soon to make the faction, Be prepared to build BIG ships! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) (I mean mining ships we need to be able to eat entire planets!)
